channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Walmart Recalls Almost 10,000 Cases Of Arsenic-Tainted Apple Juice—Here’s What To Know
item.description: The recall affects 25 states, Puerto Rico and the District of Columbia.

item.title: The steep part of the mountain
item.description: The end of the trail is usually difficult, but without the long and winding approach, there isn’t much of a mountain. The greatest hits reel and the s...

item.title: iPhone 16 Release: Apple Confirms Special Event, On A Surprise New Date
item.description: Apple has just confirmed the date for its next Special Event—and it’s not the date most were expecting.

item.title: “How can I help?”
item.description: If you have a series of tasks to do, it’s easier to ignore this question and simply get back to work. Doing the tasks is more efficient than coordinat...

item.title: Boston Dynamics: What We Need In The Emerging Golden Age Of Robotics
item.description: Increasingly robots will run like dogs, fly like birds, wriggle like snakes, swim like fish, roll like cars and—yes—walk like humans.

item.title: The sad compromise of “sponsored results”
item.description: Google made a fortune and honed sponsored search results into an art form. The theory is that people who want the traffic the most will pay for the cl...

item.title: This Security Company Has Been Flooded With Job Applicants From North Korea
item.description: From mom and pop shops to Fortune 500 firms, companies are being overwhelmed with job applications from North Korea.

item.title: The missing file
item.description: It contained some of my best writing. Cogent, clear and powerful. I found it. It wasn’t nearly as good as I remembered. In fact, it was hardly useful....

item.title: In Europe, Greece And Bulgaria Had The Highest Heat-Related Deaths In 2023
item.description: In 2023, more than 47,000 excess heat-related deaths were reported in Europe and Greece and Bulgaria had the highest mortality rates due to relentless...

item.title: Knowing your customers
